entries.title: Raising cybersecurity awareness is good for everyone - but it needs to be done better
entries.description: October is cybersecurity awareness month. But to keep people and networks safe, employees need advice all year round - and it can't be done with fear.

entries.title: The 5 best Raspberry Pi alternatives of 2022
entries.description: Here's everything you need to know about non-Pi single-board computers. We analyzed RAM, flash, storage, and more to find the best Raspberry Pi alternatives.

entries.title: Southwest Airlines has a new idea for customers. Some are already angry about it
entries.description: Oh, this won't please everyone. But when can you ever please everyone?

entries.title: The 6 best noise-canceling headphones of 2022
entries.description: Here are the top noise-canceling headphones you can buy. They use advanced technology to reduce background and surrounding noises, giving you an immersive listening experience.

entries.title: The 5 best Chromebooks of 2022
entries.description: Chromebooks make the perfect gift. Treat yourself or a loved one, as many of the best Chromebooks are more affordable than flagship models and feature healthy battery lives.
